segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see her drying dishes, completely focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, he's really stretching to reach the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the stool is going to tip over, it looks really unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl waiting for her cookie, she looks so innocent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long the sink has been overflowing, the puddle is getting big.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water streaming down the cabinets, it's creating a real mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should really be paying more attention to the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the garden outside, it looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman notices the water soon, before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
